text: Fitness Boxing is an exergaming video game developed by Rocket Company and Imagineer, and also published Worldwide by Nintendo. Released first in Japan on December 20, 2018; PAL region on December 21, 2018; South Korea on December 30, 2018; and later North America on January 4, 2019. Exclusively on Nintendo Switch. Fitness Boxing is a spiritual succesor to the Shape Boxing trilogy on Nintendo Wii, with the first two games branded by Gold's Gym fitness game. The game continues, with the sequel called Fitness Boxing 2: Rythm and Exercise, released on December 20, 2020. ==Other websites== * Official Fitness Website * * Category:2018 video games Category:Boxing video games Category:Casual games Category:Fitness games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Nintendo Switch-only games Category:Nintendo video games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Fitness Boxing
